reviews.review:
I really like this game, but i constantly get disconnected. i know my internet is fine. i uninstalled and reinstalled. checked task manager. restart pc. only start up steam in case it was because of other sites running- its not. in SWF its only me that DC's whether in the lobby or 3 minutes into the game. i could be doing anything from healing, fixing, even running around or just standing. When i get disconnected it always tells me its from the Host. that the killer DC'd. but in SWF you find out its only you. When i play killer kicking a gen i get DC'd even checking lockers. i cant play either side. Please, please, just resolve this issue. i know im not the only one. 
im honestly worried from being banned or whatevr from constant DC's . its not fair to other players either when i randomnly get cut out.
the error bullshit is annoying but other then that the game is perfect

I enjoy this game but if you are a killer it is extremely hard for you to enjoy the game. I am not having fun playing as a killer. Most of the killers I face camp their targets all the time because of how unfair the game is. The movement speed of certain killers needs to be increased.

Really good game overall. Survivors are quite toxic very often when you play killer . Hitboxes need fixing sometimes , but hey Is a good game for a low price , the grind is acceptable but if you are a new player be warned rank systems are broke and you may get higher rank players in your games. Learning curve for both sides is also very high so don't get frustrated if you don't get anyone as killer , or die all the time as survivor . You will get better :). Also get 50k free bloodpoints(in game progression currency) by finishing the 2 playable tutorials.(survivor + killer)

Worst game.
1. Super unbalanced In Red rank(1-4) 90 percent of killers are only Nurse and Spirit. That's super boring fighting against these 2 OP guys.
2. Just Ok player Nurse can kill 4 Survivors with no chance escaping.
3. Toxic community, The community is better the first couple years but still need a lot of improvement.
3.5. Farming hooked teammate. One of the worst things in the game.
4. Solo Player - being a solo Survivor even if in Red rank(Highest game rank) you will find lots of Potato Survivor there. Some of them won't team work, won't help, won't do Gen, Sometimes they just hide and wait for the Hatch(Leave teammate die). 
5. You need lots of time finding good ping match.
6. Really need better rank system it's real Suck there. Just play a lot and get rank one is not enough.
Dead by daylight-it's my life!! )

这是一名朴实憨厚为社会主义兢兢业业奋斗的农场主的故事。
农场主每天早出晚归，工作踏实可靠。
有一天受到了四个狡诈险恶的偷电贼的骚扰。
为了保护社会主义发电机，农场主拿出了玩具刀，玩具夹，玩具电锯等工具，想要吓走偷电贼。

It slaps enough to warrant a bop, the community for this is the worst i've ever seen though, and i've played games like for honor and overwatch at their peaks of toxicity.

ok now i have 342 hours so review update

Game is really fun to play but they really need to fix the hitboxes in the game that is the biggest problem and queue times as killer can take a bit at lower ranks like 20 or 12
This game is really good

Game is fun. Community is the opposite of fun.

As a survivor you get 3 other 7 IQ brainlets that turn the game into a 1v1 with some fleshy obstacles between you and the killer, who will promptly knock you onto the floor and watch you die instead of chasing literally anyone else.
Alternatively you can queue with 3 friends that are good at the game and utterly wipe anyone you come against because being able to communicate with team mates is like a mix of 3 or 4 in-game perks all at once.

As a killer you either get to enjoy a tense game where you hunt 4 lonely survivors.
Alternatively you can feel helpless with a group of 4 pros that will all get out within 2 minutes and there's nothing you can do to change that.

The game is very fun when you're matched with people at the same skill level as you but this game likes to match you with people that are either far below or far above your skill level so you either wipe the floor with your opponents faces or your face gets wiped on the floor.

Wait until it's on sale to buy it because with how toxic the community is, the game is not worth the full price
I feel as if in this game if you wanna be killer it's the worst there is so much toxic people in this game and i don't support it
Pay 2 win fully priced game.

Honestly people can't truly judge this game and say whether or not it's good until you have around your first hundred hours in. When I first got the game I thought it was impossible to play as a survivor and I wouldn't accomplish much as a killer either. The thing about this game though is that you have to play a lot to learn how to be good. After you've gotten your first 20 hours or so the games mechanics start to become familiar and can be manipulated. After 100 hours you've played enough to know all the pros and cons to this game and see how good you've became going from the survivor that hid all game to the survivor that knows how to loop and juke the killer. Overall, the game might suck sometimes because it can be really difficult but the beauty of the game is once you're through the rough patch the game is one of the most fun and unique games there is. 

Pros:
-Unique
-Devs working to help fix community issues
-A great progression system that encourages the player to continuously play the game
-Very fun after you've gotten over the learning curve

Cons:
-The game has some bugs (but they are being worked on)
-Some members of the community can be toxic
-Hard learning curve
-Connectivity issues

The reason I don't recommend this game is quite simple: I like this game (warning: it's monotonous sometimes) , the real problem are the developers who are blind and arrogant. The dead by daylight community asks them to fix the game's bugs (it's full of bugs) instead of releasing new killers/survivors/perks, there is already enough variety, no need other extra (bugged) content at the moment, and in response they promise that they will fix it, but they'll do nothing about it (cause releasing skins for killers/survivors is more important, they need to make money those "poor" guys) and if you contradict them they'll ban you from the dead by daylight forum (i experienced that when I received a 1 week ban for saying that they are lazy hypocrites and what I think of their work... Ban reason: insults towards developers will not be tolerated... I haven't insulted anyone, I have only expressed the facts as they are really are:
1 rank system is trash, especially for the killers
2 full of toxic people but honestly I don't care about it. Of course there are also (Few) cool people who play that game
3 bugs and exploits not fixed (and won't be fixed) 
4 DbD support suck
5 UNBALANCED. SWF (survive with friends) is funny, but thanks to that (and programs like discord /TeamSpeak) essentially deny the utility of some killer's perks/powers (also you'll always know where and who the killer is, giving you a GREAT advantage
Очень занимательный убийца времени. А в хорошей компании выживание сопровождается безудержным весельем :)

Jogo muito bom, jogabilidade flúida, gráficos bonitos, boas DLCs

Mas também é difícil de se adaptar as mecânicas por serem muito únicas e timings rápidos, e também por ser um jogo online meio "antigo" é fácil achar tryhards que jogam muito bem, logo às vezes deixa de ser divertido e acaba sendo frustrante.

O jogo é muito divertido ao jogar com os amigos, onde você não leva quase nada a sério e fica falando palavrão, logo não deixa de ser divertido, os emotes ajudam bastante para a comunicação Multiplayer, logo o jogo fica mais fácil, as perks só fazem você querer jogar o jogo ainda mais e mais, pois acaba fazendo o jogador querer a perk op, mas isso também acaba sendo um ponto negativo porque os jogadores que já estão no jogo acabarão tendo as perks mais ops.

Se for jogar sozinho: 6/10
Se for jogar Multiplayer: 9/10
